title: Development of a novel contact lens coating into an antibacterial technology platform for use with medical devices.
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Used to support the development of a novel family of protein biocides by Ai2 Ltd. a University of Manchester spin-out company. These are being developed for use in ophthalmic applications as part of a major commercial deal with Sauflon Pharmaceuticals / Coopervision. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Societal,Economic
